name: Attack on Titan Name Generator
description: Ready to join the Survey Corps? Find out your epic Attack on Titan name and prepare to face the Titans! Whether you're a brave soldier or a cunning strategist, this generator will give you the perfect moniker for your AoT adventure.
introduction: Ever wondered what your name would be in the world of Attack on Titan? This generator combines the grit, drama, and sheer awesomeness of the series to give you a name worthy of fighting Titans! Prepare to be amazed... and maybe a little scared.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button, you brave soul!
Behold your new Attack on Titan name – a name whispered in fear by Titans (probably).
Share your epic name with your friends and form your own Survey Corps squad!
Repeat as many times as you like – who knows what other identities await you?

faqs.question: Is this generator actually endorsed by the Survey Corps?
faqs.answer: While we admire their bravery, sadly, no. But our names are Titan-approved (unofficially, of course).

faqs.question: Can I use this name in my Attack on Titan fan fiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Unleash your creativity! Just promise to give us a shoutout when you become a literary legend.

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: Click 'Generate' again! Destiny isn't always right the first time. Keep going until you find the name that resonates with your inner Titan-slaying hero.

faqs.question: Will this generator protect me from Titans?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, no. But a cool name might intimidate them... maybe. We recommend also investing in some ODM gear.

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Completely free! Our gift to humanity in the fight against the Titans. Now go forth and claim your destiny!

faqs.question: Can I get a Titan name instead of a human name?
faqs.answer: While this generator focuses on human names, feel free to get creative and imagine what your Titan form's name would be! We believe in your imagination!
